title: Spoonful
lyrics:
You gave me just a little
Just to get me by
Just a spoonful
Is never enough to hold me over
Just a little bit
Just to get me by

Just a spoonful

Is never enough to hold me over



[?]

Good to have saved

Shot me that two-step once more



Never look back

And [?] wild and free

Never let go

Of a good reason to believe



You gave me just a little

Just to get me by

Just a spoonful

Is never enough to hold me over

Just a little bit

Just to get me by

Just a spoonful

Is never enough to hold me over



I wish you the best

It's gonna be a long, long ride

You should get some rest

Right here by my side



Never look back

And [?] wild and free

Never let go

Of a good reason to believe



You gave me just a little

Just to get me by

Just a spoonful

Is never enough to hold me over

Just a little bit

Just to get me by

Just a spoonful

Is never enough to hold me over



[?] don't come easy

And the pain won't leave me

And I don't want to fight it no more

Fight it not more



You gave me just a little

Just to get me by

Just a spoonful

Is never enough to hold me over

Just a little bit

Just to get me by

Just a spoonful

Is never enough to hold me over
